html:
EQUITIES: Tech-Driven Bid In Wake Of Amazon & Snapchat Earnings
Post-market earnings from Amazon & Snapchat allowed the U.S. tech space to
erase a portion of Thursday's losses, with the NASDAQ 100 e-mini contract last
+~2% (after the cash version of the index shed ~4.2% on Thursday). The S&P 500
e-mini is +1.2% last, while the Dow contract trades ~0.6% above settlement
levels (with the varied performance owing to relative sensitives to the tech
space).
* Meanwhile, the Hang Seng benefitted from the relative stabilisation in
  broader equity indices in recent sessions as Hong Kong markets re-opened
  after the LNY holiday. While its large tech exposure allowed the index to
  benefit from the aforementioned uptick in NASDAQ e-minis. The Hang Seng is
  +3.1% last.
